channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How much will that surgery cost? Hospital price lists remain largely unhelpful
item.description: Health care price transparency is one of the few bipartisan issues in Washington, D.C. But much of the information is not helpful to patients, and the...

item.title: Trump doesn't rule out seeking 3rd term. And, a revamp of the Smithsonian Institution
item.description: President Trump says he isn't ruling out the possibility of seeking a 3rd term in office. And, an executive order targets the Smithsonian Institution ...

item.title: French court bars far-right leader Marine Le Pen from public office for embezzlement
item.description: A French court found Marine Le Pen guilty on Monday in an embezzlement case and barred her from seeking public office for five years, with immediate e...

item.title: Charity-seekers from all over Pakistan flock to Karachi at Ramadan to collect alms

item.title: The head of Africa CDC thought news of a U.S. aid freeze must be 'a joke.' Now what?
item.description: Dr. Jean Kaseya is now figuring out how to cope with the new foreign aid landscape.

item.title: Restaurant chain to shut 2,000 branches after rat found in soup
item.description: Sukiya will temporarily shut nearly all of its roughly 2,000 branches after a rat was found in a miso soup and a bug in another meal, the company said...

item.title: Red Cross outraged over killing of medics by Israeli forces in Gaza
item.description: Six Civil Defence first responders and a UN employee were also killed in the incident in Rafah on 23 March.

item.title: France's Marine Le Pen found guilty of embezzlement, barred from elections
item.description: France's far-right leader Marine Le Pen was found guilty of embezzlement and barred from running in elections for five years.

item.title: What caused the Myanmar earthquake - and why did it make a tower in Bangkok collapse?
item.description: The size of the earthquake and the length of the fault line it occurred on contributed to the devastation.

item.title: 3 killed when tree hits vehicle in Michigan and damage reported in Tennessee amid widespread storms
item.description: Authorities in Michigan say three family members died after a tree struck their vehicle as powerful storms swept across the region.

item.title: Global shares slide as Trump tariffs loom
item.description: The US president suggests the new import taxes he is set to announce this week will hit all countries.

item.title: 'I feel guilty for not being in Myanmar - our people need us the most now'
item.description: They fled war - now Myanmar's diaspora feel helpless watching their country struggle after the quake.

item.title: Russia still 'working with US' after Trump says he is 'angry' with Putin
item.description: In its first response to Trump's criticism of Putin, the Kremlin tried to play down the tensions between the two leaders.
